comment._content:
This is the funeral of "Big" Tim Sullivan, on September 15, 1913.

LOC -- "Bowery" should be capitalized.

Everyone,

Thanks for the detective work on this image and the others of the funeral of 'Big Tim' Sullivan.  We will update this record as well as the other related images to reflect the details.
